about_the_game:
In a quiet and peaceful neighborhood, you embarked on a long journey to purchase the market of your dreams, and finally, you have reached your goal. Now, it's time to manage your own market to provide quality products and friendly service to the neighborhood residents!

In this exciting simulation game, you will have the opportunity to manage your own neighborhood market. With a wide range of products, from beverages to food items, from cleaning products to technology goods, it's in your hands to satisfy your customers.

Personalize and Expand Your Market
Customize your market as you desire! Control every detail, from shelf arrangements to storefront displays. As you earn, expand your market and warehouse, add new products, and enhance your business by increasing customer flow.

Enjoyable Simulation Experience
Store Simulator offers a detailed graphical interface, realistic simulation features, and a fun-filled experience with engaging tasks. Establish your own business, grow it, and achieve success by serving the people in your neighborhood.

Remember, your neighborhood will become more beautiful with you, and it will become even more vibrant with your market! Good luck!

name: Store Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit) / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K / AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit) / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

short_description: You've embarked on a journey to acquire your dream market and have finally reached your goal. Now, manage your market to offer friendly service to the neighborhood! Provide a range of products, from beverages to food, cleaning items to electronics, meeting community needs.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
